onERC1155BatchReceived(address,address,u.details: The smart contract calls this function on the recipient after a `safeTransferFrom`. This function MAY throw to revert and reject the transfer. Return of other than the magic value MUST result in the transaction being reverted Note: the contract address is always the message sender

params.data: Additional data with no specified format
params.from: The address which previously owned the token
params.ids: An array containing ids of each token being transferred
params.values: An array containing amounts of each token being transferred

onERC1155Received(address,address,uint25.details: The smart contract calls this function on the recipient after a `safeTransferFrom`. This function MAY throw to revert and reject the transfer. Return of other than the magic value MUST result in the transaction being reverted Note: the contract address is always the message sender

params.data: Additional data with no specified format
params.from: The address which previously owned the token
params.id: An array containing the ids of the token being transferred
params.value: An array containing the amount of tokens being transferred
